text: ane ame musa (a.Sa.) Pase trisa ratri'onum vacana karyum ane vadhum dasa ratri'o vade, te trisa ratri'one puri kari, to te'ona palanaharano samaya kula calisa ratri'ono tha'i gayo, ane musa (a.Sa.) E potana bha'i haruna (a.Sa.) Ne kahyum ke mara pachi a loko mate vyavastha gothavaso ane te'oni andara sudharo karata rahejo ane nakama lokoni salaha na manaso
